value.name: Super Scissors
value.description: A safe and stylish way to destroy those pesky loops of rubber known as elastics. Designed by Guy Fieri.

value.name: Hungry Cops
value.description: Known to regularly destroy fried loops of dough.

value.name: Tire Fire
value.description: Mountains of thick rubber loops being a problem? Fire is a great solution!

value.name: Savvy Lawyers
value.description: Finding and breaking Contract Loopholes is what they're good at. No one said they were saints.

value.name: Kaiju
value.description: Each giant monster wreaks havoc on rollercoasters in it's own unique way.

value.name: Moon Shaped Planet Destroyer
value.description: This "not a moon" only targets planets with rings.

value.name: Black Hole
value.description: Singularities are probably good at destroying any loop you can throw at them.

value.name: bad programmer
value.description: Creates memory leaks, which cause your main program loop to crash.
